channel.title: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)
channel.description:
Hello guys working here on my seccond model. Been on it for about a good 3 hours and its not completely done...(texturing) But the basic idea is here. [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/honorgaurdpike.jpg[/img]
:D And of course the refrence pic witch was hard cause it was turned :P [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/HonorGuard02.jpg[/img]
*NEW* InGame: [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/ingame.jpg[/img]

item.title: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“frogtamer101, post:31, topic:284313”]trying it now
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 10:48:24 am[/size][hr]lol trying to find a spot to train
I have an awful problem all my servers and client crash aftert the seccond click so its quite annoying and hard to get around[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 10:50:16 am[/size][hr]YES IT WORKED I LOVE YOU That looks fuckin sweet :D[/quote]

yw, ill pm you the run,walk, stand anims later on when im not tired/have the time =P

item.title: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)
item.dc:creator: @frogtamer101 frogtamer101
item.description:
@frogtamer101 wrote:

Should this be in the srver[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 10:18:19 am[/size][hr]And this is what Im getting in my server client.java:

setAnimation(Wear.GetWepAnim(this)); } else { } if (Server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && Server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY) viewTo(Server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn; faceNPCupdate = true;

Read full topic
item.source: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)

item.title: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

open up client.java and search…

GetWepAnim

now under that add this…

if(id == @@@@) // ID of your weapon { return 2080; }

it should look something like this… (depending on where you put the anim)

public int GetWepAnim(int id) { if(id == -1) // unarmed { return 422; } if(id == @@@@) // ID of your weapon { return 2080; }

This is only the attack emote, if you want to know how to add the run,walk,stand anim just pm and ill mssg you everything
i like the model btw =P

EDIT: be sure to save > compile > and then run your server for these to work

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo Weapon== Honor Guard Pike == (InGame PIC)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Definitely needs a texture on the orange sections, and you should colour the rest more of a navy blue, not purple.

I suggest you use a texture a little like this.
http://www.webdesign.org/img_articles/11435/lava8.jpg
If you don’t know how to add textures, find my tutorial, it’s somewhere near the metasequoia section, explaining about the material menu.

Read full topic
